# Ranking

## lollipop

```{r "lollipop"}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)

mtcars2 <- mtcars %>%
    mutate(car = rownames(mtcars)) %>%
    mutate(mpg_z = round(scale(mpg), 2)) %>%
    mutate(mpg_type = ifelse(mpg_z < 0, "below", "above")) %>%
    arrange(mpg_z)

mtcars2 %>% head()

ggplot(mtcars2, aes(x = mpg, y = car)) +
    geom_segment(aes(x = 0, y = car, xend = mpg, yend = car)) +
    geom_point()
```
